title: innEnu gatiyenagelO
sahitya:
innEnu gatiyenagelO hariye


anupallavi

  ninnavanennade mOsa hOdeno ranga


caraNam 1    angadoLADuva shishugaLa muddina binkada savi nuDigaLa kELuta 
kinkiNi dhvanige kivi koTTu kELuta mankAda hariNanantAdenallO ranga
    caraNam 2    ele nijavrittitayanuLidu durannava naliduNDu hoTteya horeyutali 
kaLeya tudiya mAmsake banderagutta silukida mIninantAdenallO ranga
    caraNam 3    para vaniteyara lAvaNyake lOcana carisuttalavara kUTava bayasi 
uriva kiccu tanage hitavendu adaroLu eragida patanganantAdenallo krSNa
    caraNam 4    lampaTanAgi nArEra mukhAbjada sompina kampanAghrANisuta 
sampigeyesaLina mEle kuLitirda sompadaLiyante AdanallO krSNa
    caraNam 5    taDeyalArade guhyEndriya capalava maDadiya ranga sangava bayasi 
oDala kiccige mEle baDigallu keDahi koNDadi bidda mUSakanantAdenallO krSNa
    caraNam 6    noindenalla ninna mahimeya kELade mandanAdenu viSayava bayasi 
tande shrI purandara viTTala nInE dayadindendigu bhava dUra mADelo hari
